name: 02-Data Preparation
content:
Data Description and Preparation

Data Description:

The input dataset includes patient-level clinical trial records for Bellâs Palsy treatment:

  • Features: 19 variables capturing demographics, treatment details, clinical scores, symptoms, and medical history.
  • Variable Types:
  • Categorical: Sex, Treatment Group, Prednisolone/Acyclovir flags, symptom indicators, preexisting conditions, recovery status.
  • Numerical: Age, Baseline Score, Time to Treatment, Recovery Scores, Pain Level.
  • Granularity: Subject-level with longitudinal measurements at baseline, 3 months, and 9 months.

Data Preparation:

  • Cleaning: Handle missing or inconsistent entries, standardize time intervals.
  • Feature Engineering: Encode categorical variables, create derived features such as time-to-treatment or severity indexes.
  • Transformation: Normalize numerical features for anomaly detection algorithms.
  • Outlier Analysis: Identify extreme or unusual values to enhance model performance.
